channel.title: Running Azure (Rune Source)
channel.description:
[img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/3117/88006505.png[/img]
I get that error when trying to run Azure.
EDIT: When I run it in Eclipse I get this: Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap

item.title: Running Azure (Rune Source)
item.dc:creator: @vZore vZore
item.description:
@vZore wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:2, topic:449506”]You’re giving more RAM usage to the server then your computer can handle.

Post your Run code.[/quote]

For the .bat it’s
@echo Off
title Server
java -Xmx1500m -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -noverify -cp bin;libs/* com.rs2.Server localhost 43594 600
pause

Read full topic
